website_summaries.verdict: For those dogs who need more than just a normal bed to get comfy. Super supportive for pets with arthritis, joint pain, and/or in need of the perfect place to rest achy bones.
pros: Retains 90 percent of its shape even after washing
American- made with top-of-the-line memory foam for durability, and won't flatten like a pancake
Looks like a high-end velvety couch
goes well with other household furnishings
cons: Might be warm for some dogs during the summer months

customer_reviews.title: Not dig proof
customer_reviews.text: This extremely expensive dog bed only lasted a week. We moved and wanted our Dane to have a comfy resistant dog bed instead of the couch and after a lot of research, we decided that with the tough, chew resistant fabric, this bed would be the last we would ever have to buy. Unfortunately though it didn’t last the week and now I spend my mornings picking up all the loose foam. My Dane doesn’t chew but “nests” where she’ll dig around until she gets comfortable. Maybe this bed would work for non-diggers but very disappointed it was so expensive and tore so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Fur babies are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My Great Dane seems to appreciate his elbows are no longer digging into the hardwood floor. Expensive but worth it for my big guy... Wouldn't you say?! 😉 Love the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy, Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: In this video I'm trying to demonstrate how sturdy this bed is. The lighting isn't perfect, but I hope you can see how my knees and elbows are putting a lot of pressure per square inch into this bed, and I'm not even coming close to being able to press down to the ground. It's a very supportive and comfortable bed. This particular bed is the XL size, which fits perfect for my German Shepherd. He loves the headrest and has plenty of room to stretch out. I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles/tears
customer_reviews.text: It took me months and a lot of thought to make this almost $300 purchase. It’s the only dog bed big enough for my lab. That’s the only plus. The bed has several big wrinkles in it. Along with the small wrinkles covering it that the instructions claim would be gone. There was also a tear at the zipper area and foam was hanging out. I’m very upset about this. Mainly because I spent almost $300 for something that’s now serving just as a bed big amount for my dog. If I spend that much money on anything, I don’t expect issues. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the giant bed for our 120 pound Alaskan Malamute who just had a hip replacement surgery. He usually does not like to lay on a bed but it is his go to spot where he falls right asleep. We have another husky/Malamute that loves laying on the bed too so we will be ordering him one soon too. Our 6 year old son even fell asleep on it the other night with the dogs. Although expensive, the beds are very good quality and the customer service is excellent. We ordered our bed on Thursday evening and had it Saturday morning through the expedited shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product, very thin fabric worthless for big dogs with big teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 large very expensive therapeutic beds for our German Shepherds. One is still in good shape but the other one was destroyed after just a few days. Our shepherd ripped the fabric by doing the natural dog thing by going round and round I a circle to form a sleeping place and that is all it took. She then began rip it further and then grab the foam on the inside and take chunks out of it. This fabric which was advertised as durable is a very thin microfiber which tears extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hedges

customer_reviews.title: This is the first item I have return to Amazon Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I would caution each purchaser to choose another product. For a four glued together pieces of foam this product is a disgrace to be made for sale. At best it should not sell for more than $19.95. To be advertised as a therapeutic bed for a dog, is bordering on the greatest false assertion in this century. I was so excited when ordering and waiting to get it and when it arrived compacted in a small box and then put down for my dog to sleep on and he took one sniff of the cover and walked away. Has refused to sleep on it one time. A total worthless product and a waste of time dealing with the worthless product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.  Buy this bed!!!  Excellent bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received our giant bed and are throughly pleased. Bursting with quality!! We have 2 English mastiffs and they fit wonderfully on the giant bed. I can't say enough about the quality. The fabric his soft and sturdy. It easily zips off to wash. The inner foam is so cushiony!!!! I can stand on it and not feel the floor. This bed will definitely prevent the elbow swelling that mastiffs get. Go for it. Spend the money. It is well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: martha walker

customer_reviews.title: WAY over priced for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Bed is OK, but for almost $300 don't waste your money. You can buy so many other options with the same results for 80% less. We remove the cover and there is only cheap foam inside that is glued together. Bet is OK, but not for this much money.
customer_reviews.author: M. T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very comfortable for my dog and I do notice a slight difference in her hip issues. It is a very high quality product with no abnormal odor. 1 year later- I notice a huge difference in my german shepherds movement, she’s walking so good and doesn’t seem stiff after laying for a while. I would recommend this bed to anyone who is considering it to give your dog a more comfortable place to lay. Cons: it is not waterproof, then you have to spend an extra $100 dollars on the waterproof lining after already spending over $300 on the bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong package sent
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. The bed I THOUGHT I was purchasing was the headrest edition (per the item description). I receive the item and it’s the sleek edition which is worth less than what I paid. I took it out of the box thinking this was the correct item. It was vacuum sealed which now no longer fits in the box to return. The item is quite heavy and now needs returned. After talking to multiple people with amazon I now will have someone come to my house to pick up the item unpackaged. With the amount of money prime is and this item which with tax was $310 I should be having no issues whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old Great Dane puppy ( just starting the pulling his stuffed toys apart stage) shredded the pillow top in minutes. Literally minutes! It looks like once he punctured a hole in the fabric, the fabric ran like a pair of nylons. I cannot give a review on if he liked it or not or if it was waterproof but I guess I can say it was easy to get off. ☹️ Disappointed, I had such high hopes for it.
customer_reviews.author: s. gibbons

customer_reviews.title: If you can afford this bed, buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! Thought for sure this would be another "why did I spend this much $"? Not even one regret. I was letting it air out before I officially turned it over to the pooch. I heard snoring and went looking, well guess who was in her new bed like the Queen of the Land? Lol! She hasn't used any other bed since I put it out. I will be buying another one for my bedroom so she has two great places to sleep. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: After my dog slipped and ruptured discs in his neck, resulting an emergency surgery, I researched ortho beds and found Big Barker as the top rated. It is worth the price. During my dog's recovery, he had to potty in the bed so the waterproof liner is key. I know it is expensive, but this is a bed to be had for years. The liner is key in keeping the mattress clean and is easy to get on/off. I definitely recommend this Big Barker bed. Not only for recovery purposes as he now sleeps in this bed every night and is super comfortable--stays put all night.
customer_reviews.author: tjb

customer_reviews.title: Pure luxury and comfort for my best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a dog bed for my aging Saint Bernard that would provide comfort and support. This bed does exactly that. Despite having a king size bed there's not enough room for the dog to sleep with us (he is blind and getting pretty old and wants to be near his people constantly) but putting this dog bed next to our bed satisfied our dogs need for comfort. He took to it immediately and has been happy ever since. We travel with our dog for business and now he will have a comfy bed wherever we go. Thank you Big Barker!
customer_reviews.author: Nitrobunny

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 14 with arthritis. She is so picky about change that I didn't expect her to take to the bed right away. I expected to have to coax her into trying it. I did have to talk her into getting on it the first time, but she immediately took to it. She took a heavy nap and with her head on the pillow it seemed to help her snoring. She seems to be moving around a lot better in the mornings. She still gets sore by bedtime, but she sleeps soundly and wakes up refreshed. We had a nice bed for her before this one, but it just wasn't alleviating pain. This one clearly is. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Good dog bed , 1 stars as microfiber is not chew proof and very thin
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product, comes tighily packed and fits my dog crate as mentioned, my 5 month old 65 pound GSD immediately accepted it and seems to sleep well. No issues with smell with memory foam.My dog is very picky with beds, have tried 3 so far. I am not sure if he is going chew on it/rip it apart only time will tell. I will change my rating to 5 stars if lasts more than a month as he/puppy is still teething. Update: my dog did rip it off.did not last one week as expected. Don't buy this dog bed save your money
customer_reviews.author: Sark

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing two beds at the pet store and seeing how quickly the foam crushes, I ordered the large barker for my great dane mix. Time will tell but looks and feels like quality and will be much more supportive than the cheaper foam beds. Only problem now is sharing it with her cat buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!! My 8 year old 95lb pit bull has had bilateral knee surgery and is showing signs of hip pain, she would have a hard time getting out of her store bought beds and when she did get up would limp for about 5 minutes.. I knew I needed to do something! After much research and reading so many wonderful reviews I decided on this bed for her AND thank goodness I did!!! She LOVES her bed and gets out of it with no problems and I noticed is sleeping better at night. You may think it's a lot of money for a dog bed but trust me, it's worth every penny!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: No more spinning around trying to get up!
customer_reviews.text: It's a GREAT bed, came with cover already on. Lighter weight than I thought it would be, easy to move around. Unpacked easily, expanded rapidly. Decided to buy waterproof liner - now I just habe to put it on. Bed is not meant to be "soft" (the cover is soft n comfy). It supports my moms baby everywhere he needs it EVENLY. No sinking in, in various spots. Even, supportive pressure and comfort. Now, hopefully, his arthritis won't be as bad getting up and down. Wally's not spinning around on his bed anymore, trying to get up & out! Happy! Happy!
customer_reviews.author: jla

customer_reviews.title: It’s big enough for my dog
customer_reviews.text: It took several weeks for my dog to start laying on this bed. She still prefers her softer one with bolsters on two sides. Tge bed is well made and the cover is very nice. I love it’s size and ease of pulling cover on and off for washing. The color is great also. I wish it had a little more of a bolster and one along the long side as well. My dogs like to lay there head on one bolster and the other they push up against with their body. it is very stiff so I had to put a softer dog bed on top.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Trebino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well built bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the chaise style beds as she likes to use the pillow. This bed exceeded expectations, very thick and plush. It did take her a day or two to get used to it, it's a bit taller than her last worn out bed. I did as they suggested and rubbed my hands over it to add my scent and put a few treats on it for her and she now loves it. I also did this because it had a few wrinkles as others stated but once I let it plump up fully and rubbed my hands from the center out a few times it's smooth and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Let K fix it

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this bed and is very happy.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Shepard mix we rescued and he is now 11 years old with extremely bad arthritis in his back and hips. It is hard for him to get comfortable and he has a dog bed, our bed, the couch basically anywhere he wants to lay down so I started researching dog beds and saw the great reviews and very important to us is that it is made in USA. Our dog loves this bed and stays on it like a king. We are so happy with this bed and is wonderful to see him happy and comfortable. I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: It's expensive and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We have an 11 year old 68 pound yellow lab who recently started showing neurological symptoms and stopped sleeping for more than a few hours at a time. We thought it was time to spoil him but who on earth would pay $230 for a dog bed? Well I can now say we do! It is immediately his favorite spot in the house. He presses up against the headrest and sleeps soundly for hours. This was a complete home run for us! I wish they weren't so expensive or we'd buy a second one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The most important review comes from my best friend Tayo. He loves the bed. Tayo is now close to 7 years old. He's gone through 5 beds. Beds were purchased from vendors in China, Groupon, etc. Each previous bed advertised as having excellent cushion and support but within a few weeks the cushion was worn out. This bed on the other hand is more firm than my expensive sleep number bed. Tayo appears to be more comfortable than anyone in my house while he sleeps. It was a perfect gift for him as he enters his later years. I want him to be as comfortable as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jamel Embree

customer_reviews.title: NO SLIPCOVER, CHEAP BEDCOVER, TOO HOT AND LITTLE  TOO HARD
customer_reviews.text: for $258 this bed had NO slipcover covering the foam AND the bedcover is made out of cheap, cheap material which radiates intense heat. Bedcover too tight around pillow area making it hard for dog to use pillow comfortably. I have two dogs neither liked the bed. I had hopes that this bed would be great..... I will be returning it The size was
customer_reviews.author: KELLYMB

customer_reviews.title: This bed offers tremendous support
customer_reviews.text: My almost 12 year old Australian Shepherd has arthritis in throughout her body from being very active all her life. It is especially pronounced in her elbows and now spine. I try to help manage her condition with a high quality diet, supplements, weekly laser and acupuncture treatments. This bed offers total support for her and of all her joints. It is well made and the outer covering can easily be removed and washed. Also very important to me is the fact that it is American made. I would highly recommend the Big Barker to anyone who has a dog, especially one that suffers from stiff and painful joints.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: Although the price is at first a bit off-putting, we finally purchased a Big Barker for our 50# boxer mix as she developed problems with her knee. We couldn't be more pleased! The foam is very thick and supportive. The cover is of a decent quality for a non-destructive type dog and, since Darla started using the bed, her knee is actually beginning to heal. If you have a pet who is having joint problems and want to do your best to stave off surgery in addition to helping them rest comfortably, I highly recommend the Big Barker.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McConnell

customer_reviews.title: My dog enjoys her new bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes the bed. She jumped on it immediately. It is large because she is a big dog but I can easily change the cover. The cover is easier to change than other beds we have had. I ordered the waterproof protective under cover in case of an leaky accident. it actually made slipping on the bed cover easy. I am glad you offer replacement covers because my dog likes to scrape around before she lies down. I hope the cover proves to be sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sue H.

customer_reviews.title: The best dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bed. Our golden retriever loves it. The foam is very supportive and the cover is nice and soft and easy to clean. We put a soft blanket on top since he likes to have something to nest with and it works perfect. Even if he paws at the bed some the cover looks like brand new. Granted he's not a strong digger but the material seems sturdy. Very happy knowing it's made in the USA! Well worth the money you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stefaniak

customer_reviews.title: Happy Barker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean- probably? Water resistance- such BS way to describe the item. What isn’t already ‘water resistant’? It isn’t an oil-based product so this aspect of the review is dumb. Softness - my children love it. Honestly though - my lab loves his bed. From day one to now he is enamored with it and my experience with the company has been fantastic when I asked for clarification about the difference of foam which I received vs what they showed on their website. I would have loved a waterproof cover but cold to justify 90 when I can take mattress covers that accomplish the same task for less.
customer_reviews.author: Family_people4827

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely hated this bed. She would not stop digging and scratching it to try to get the cover off. I emailed the manufacturer right away and they gave me some ideas to get her used to the new bed. I appreciated that; however, it did not change the dog’s disdain for the bed. She finally managed to rip the cover - so if you have a strong digger it might now work for your dog. Also, DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON. The year trial and warranty only apply if you buy from Big Barker directly. On a positive note, their customer service is quick to respond and tried to help.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K. Boudway

customer_reviews.title: Love the height of the foam and also the cover. Haven't washed it yet but am sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 year old Lab that was abused when he was young. SO, he tends to be frightened of, well, just about anything!! He was afraid to go near his bed to begin with, but after a few days he gingerly lifted his front paw and stepped up to his bed...He has finally gotten comfortable and sleeps on it all the time now. We are very happy with the bed and think it was a great buy. I am sure it will last him for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Refuses to use it since it got stained.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my older dog who has a few health problems. It took a couple days for her warm up to laying on it . Long story short, a tumor she had bled and went right through the cover into the mattress. I cleaned it as best as I could, even reached out to the company (who did respond) but it is still very stained and she shuns the dog bed. I'm not sure exactly why she refuses to but either way I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost if you've got the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first dog bed I've bought for a dog that actually gets used!!! My senior rescue had been at the rescue most of her life, so she was having to live on the cheap. Since day 1 she has used her bed, and even when I have her come up on the bed to hang out, she eventually goes right back to her bed. She even started sleeping in. 😍 I would definitely recommend this bed to anyone with a large to XL dog, it's very sturdy, but still comfy (I lie on it with her occasionally). It's also easy to clean, the cover's zipper goes almost all the way around for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. F.

customer_reviews.title: Itaboochee loves this
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing dog bed! It is super comfortable, I have actually taken a nap on it with my pup. The XL version is plenty big enough for my 97-100lbs pup to spread out and get as comfortable as he wants. What made me get this bed is my puppy. He is going to be 7 this year and I want to not only make him as comfortable as possible but keep him happy and with me as long as I can. This bed is NOT waterproof unless you buy the protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: VeteranSuicideAwarenessJeep

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for older arthritic fur babies
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! I bought 2 other cheaper "orthopedic" dog beds which turned out to be too thin and not supportive at all, before I finally gave in and bought the expensive but so worth it big Barker bed. This bed is super thick and does not flatten when my fat husky lays on it. My girl is 12 yrs old now and was noticeably stiff and sore when getting up from her old dog bed so I was looking for something to relieve her joint pain. This bed was worth every penny! She sleeps like a rock and no longer seems stiff when getting up after long naps.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Buckalew

customer_reviews.title: Intant love affair
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bed about an hour ago and even tough they say to wait 24 for full expansion, mine was prefect withing a few minutes. My dogs has been laying on it not moving. She loves it. She was diagnosed with a pinched nerve about a week ago in her lower back that has caused some loss of mobility in her back legs. Since she needs to rest most of the time I thought this would be the best bed for her. I was not wrong. it is worth every penny. Thank you Big Barker for such a great product!!!!!!! PS: She is 80 pounds and I decided to get the Large. Perfect size for her.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed for Big Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have an English Mastiff, 180 lbs of pure love and joy. I have gone through so many different beds for her and this is by far the best bed I have ever purchased. Both her and my German Shephard use it together and he's 130lbs. Even with both of them on it, it still doesn't sink in - this bed is tough stands up to all the weight and wrestling. I will never buy a bed from anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Preston

customer_reviews.title: GSD Approved!
customer_reviews.text: This bed, we’ve had now for almost a month. My two yr old GSD was diagnosed with hip dysphasia so I wanted a quality bed for her. She loves it, as does the mutt we have. I’m also impressed with how easy it is to take the cover off for washing, and I also ordered the waterproof liner to keep it clean forever. It was so easy to put the cover back on. Great design - great bed! Thank you from all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Jambo took to this bed immediately
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our Midwest XXL Giant Dog Crate. Extremely easy to remove and replace mattress. It is very comfortable to me and I am about 100 pounds heavier than Jambo (about 150). The cover is very soft but attracts hair like a magnet. We will be getting a cover so we can reduce intervals between washing. Jambo used to whine and shift a lot on his former bed. With the Big Barker he generally sleeps motionless and doesn't whine any more. Absolutely the best especially if you have a heavy pup like a mastiff or Dane. If a Mastiff cant squash this bed......none can!
customer_reviews.author: Amy'sBUYS

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are just "okay" with it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will choose to sleep on a different brand and much less expensive bed just as often as they'll choose to sleep on this one. I'm not that thrilled with it, quite frankly. I made the mistake of getting a red one and my husky's shedded blond hair really stand out on it. My dog with the joint issues will often lay on the floor next to it rather than sleeping on the bed. After all the hype, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: hannah6

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Ever! Look no further -You can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many dog beds over the last 20 years and finally this is the one! I'll never have to buy another dog bed. We have had this bed for years and it has been handed down from my 100+ lb Ridgeback/Lab to my 75lb American bulldog. It is so well made and the foam is still like it was day one when we got it! It is so comfortable I could sleep on it! It is a must to get the waterproof liner though. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment For My Dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a nine-year-old, 150 pound Rottweiler. A few years ago, I noticed he was getting a little stiff and sore when he got up from his bed. It was a very expensive Levenger pet bed, but it did not have the support that this bed does. Three years in, the bed is good as new. I am about to shell out almost $500 to buy two more, because my other two Rottweiler pups keep stealing their big brother's bed. Yes it is pricey, but if you have a big dog you love it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri H.

customer_reviews.title: My dog has a better bed than I do!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this bed for a couple of weeks now, but the bed is quality. It puffed up right out of the box. We got this bed for our 4 year old beabull with hip dysplasia. She would sleep with us at night, but our mattress was not supportive enough for her. She would have trouble getting off the bed and walking after. Not with this bed! She loves this bed. She doesn't even try to get on my bed anymore! I've seen a drastic reduction in her limping already and she's more energetic.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Jean Clini

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bed came compressed in a smaller shipping box, expanded fine. Initially had a little smell. This dissipated within a couple hours of airing it out. Very sturdy and solid, It can comfortably hold my 190 lbs. Our golden doodle took to it right off and loves it. The cover can come off for cleaning, but we haven’t tried that yet. The price is a bit higher than I wanted to pay for a dog bed, but I’m OK for the quality I received. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mparmy98

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This bed is legit! I have aging large dogs and I am so happy they get to sleep on this bed. They normally would sneak into our bed during the night, but now they stay on their Big Barker until their breakfast time. I tried out one to check it out, then quickly bought a second. I did also purchase the waterproof liner. I wish it just came with it, though. But the bed itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Frog Fan

customer_reviews.title: Dens , sturdy bed for my German Shepherd Pi.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this dog bed for me German Shepherd who is 7. He’s chewed through 5 beds in 7 years. He’s. Taken to this bed so far. Water resistance us unknown to date. Too early yet. My Pi is 125 pounds and he barely makes a dent in the dense foam of this bed. I’m sure he’ll be suffering hip dysplasia as he ages. Hopefully the bed deters the anomaly. I like it a lot too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best dog bed ever. Better than all others I bought over the years. My dog is 50 pounds and there’s not a slight dent on it. I lied down on the bed and it’s pretty comfy even for humans. It’s also super roomy. I would say this though...I placed the bed against the wall and my dog keeps hitting his back and head on it so a bolster around it would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fer F

customer_reviews.title: Big and Supportive for my Greyhound
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to get a Big Barker several times but I do have futon mattresses here and there for the hounds. They are wonderful in a bonus room but do take up a lot of room anywhere else. I had a good ortho bed in the bedroom but it finally did start to sink in, after many years. I received this last week and as of yet it seems perfect. I like that the company is easy to contact and does first and foremost think of the big dogs out there that need support.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed for my GSD
customer_reviews.text: We looked around for a bed for the hardest working family member and we found it, the Big Barker. Our pup, 4yr old and about 70lbs just loves her bed. She fits perfectly with room to grow. Yes, she takes naps throughout the day and ALWAYS retreats to the most comfortable place, her Big Barker. ** That's her favorite sheet over her Big Barker. She will not rest until her sheet is freshly out of the dryer and on her bed. Heavenly. Yes, it's a bit pricey but it is something you WON'T regret. Your "fur kid" will get alot of use and comfort from this product. I am happy with this decision and I know you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Underfoot

customer_reviews.title: It simply does not get better than BIG BARKER.  Don't Hesitate
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing to dislike about this product. This is my second Big Barker. As we now have three English Bulldogs additional sleeping accommodations were needed. We've had our first Big Barker over a year now and it still looks and performs like new. You can certainly spend less on a bed BUT if you are like I was in the past you will be forced to buy another one soon as the cheaper pet store brands simply do not stand up. You simply can not go wrong with this brand. Awesome brand and awesome family business. Do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: athena

customer_reviews.title: Approved by dogs... and cats!
customer_reviews.text: This is a REALLY nice dog bed. I spent quite a bit of time looking at reviews for many of the dog beds available on Amazon and finally decided on the Big Barker because 1) made in USA, 2) supports small business, 3) external articles listed the Big Barker as one of the best beds on the market. I’m really happy with our purchase, and clearly my dog... and cat... are too! My dog is 65 lbs and the Large size is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea

customer_reviews.title: Big Barker for Big Baby Dogs
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old (50lb) mixed breed female & 5 year old (70lb) pit bull male sleep on the xl headrest edition big Barker together & fit comfortably. Female tore ccl & wasn't a good candidate for the surgery so we decided to invest in a bed that would support the alternatives. Took about a day for female to accept the bed, but my male took to it right away! Had a few weeks and so far, very impressed! Update***Liked so much, I bought a second one so both dogs have their own. Washed and dried them (covers) this weekend and they look brand new and held up well in washers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Dog Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our Big Barker bed. Exceptional quality and would highly recommend this bed. The fact that the Big Barker is made in America was a contributing factor in making my selection and I was not disappointed. Having had other dog beds over many years, I can honestly say that the Big Barker Bed is far superior. A family member with two Great Danes had recommended the bed to me and I am so glad they did. I have a Golden Retriever who not only sleeps on it, but plays on it with her toys.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with your product. I’m mad because I’ve spent good money on other dog beds only to be disappointed. My fur baby loves her new bed. It’s helping very much with her mobility and finally getting some restful sleep. Well worth the price tag and I would recommend this to anyone looking for good quality bedding for their dogs. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: The best dog bed ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our 215 pound Great Dane is sleeping on the XL and is happy as a clam. I wanted to upload a picture so that you can see how comfy he is. He is 5 years old and just beginning to have joint issues. This bed is great also because the bolster cover is part of the entire cover - in past beds the bolster was separate from the bed and very difficult to put back on (the cover was 1 piece with zippered sections for the bed and bolster. This is so much easier...and these pictures are from the first day that we received it!
customer_reviews.author: MaddieT

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 lb lab/pittie mix who had acl surgery last year. Had tried other "orthopedic" beds but would still notice her walking with a slight limp and stiffness. Getting this bed has helped her a lot, she sleeps much more comfortably and I have noticed her having an easier time moving around. I got the XL and I'm sure a large would have been the perfect fit for her.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rodea

customer_reviews.title: The last dog bed you'll buy
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the third Big Barker orthopedic bed I've bought over the past few years. After my pit bull passed, I donated his bed to the local humane society for a dog undergoing medical treatment needed a more comfortable bed. The condition of the bed was excellent - I've never had a dog bed that held up better. I've since ordered two more for the home, one upstairs, one downstairs for a large GSD. Wonderful for larger dogs, or any dog with hip or joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: The company needs a better cover! resistant to soiled covers
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed, it needs a much better resistant cover from urine, etc. During a storm that we had, one of my dogs went on the bed and pooped and it DID slightly go through the cover...they do have covers for sale and I wish that the covers were made a bit bigger. For me, I need a thicker, a bit bigger cover so I don't have to struggle getting it on!
customer_reviews.author: gail lerman

customer_reviews.title: I love it but my dog .... not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Our Big Barker came quickly and was packaged like the new mattresses compressed in clear plastic. Upon opening it, it expanded very quickly. It had a mild odor that went away the next day. The bed is like an expensive memory foam mattress. My dog prefers her softer beds where she can dig into them to make a cozy spot. Im hoping that she will start to use it. I suppose I can take away her other beds but this seems mean to me. I'll update this review if she has a change of heart.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I got the large for my 85lbs Rottweiler and it is great. There is plenty of room for him to lay out fully and still room to spare. I wasn’t sure about spending so much but it doesn’t go down at all when he lays on it. His other was flat as a pancake after a month and this one is much higher and fuller. We did end up getting the waterproof liner a few days after getting it which increases the cost but since this seems it really will last a long time it should be worth it. The liner and cover are very easy to remove and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed-I could totally sleep on it myself! I have a 5 month old puppy that already weighs 100 pounds and wanted something theraputic for him to sleep on. BTW I have 3 dogs and they can all lie on this comfortably. Just took the cover off this week and washed it-super simple and it has survived my 5 month old puppy unlike the last 3 dog beds!!!
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog with degenerative disease
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable (I tried it out first). Our boxer instantly liked it. I laid on it to get my scent on it and then put her favorite blanket on it. She was used to sharing our king size bed with us but due to health issues, the Vet does not want her jumping on and off our bed. We figured this would be the next best thing. She would still prefer our but at least she has her own luxurious bed now. We now have a baby gate at our bedroom to keep her from being tempted to jump on the bed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: N. Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Best beds EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two large size beds . One each for our 60 lbs retired racing greyhounds/ rescued. They have only had them two days and are getting used to them. So far they seem perfect!!!!!! The quality,craftsmanship is superb. So very nice to know that my GREYS will be sleeping on the best👍 Buying the inferior round “ fluff” dog beds x how many thru the years is no more. These “ ladies” GREYS deserve the BEST and that is BIG BARKER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed after our nine year old Anatolian began limping. Vet said no more jumping up on our bed. Problem is our bed is a Tempur-pedic which he loves to sleep on. After looking at their dog beds and the prices, we opted for the Big Barker. It arrived on time and right out of the box we could tell it was a nice quality dog bed. Nice thick foam along with an attractive fitted cover. We also purchased the waterproof cover for extra protection. This is a really nice product. Although our Anatolian still prefers our bed, he likes this one just as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JLC - TX

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so comfy that I could take a nap on it! We have two large dogs, and they are always fighting over who gets this bed. It has a little raised part on the end that acts like a pillow for dogs who enjoy that kind of thing. (ours do) The foam in the bed is great and very comfortable. Even better, you can buy a waterproof lining to go inside of the bed in case you have a dog who struggles with holding their urine in. We definitely would buy this bed again. It is a GREAT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed! A must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dog bed, 100% worth the investment for your dog. Quality is amazing and has 10 year warranty. Great company and customer service as well. Stop wasting your money on cheap beds that turn into trash within a year and get this bed. Your dog will thank you and you’ll feel good that their joints and overall health are well taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Tyson loves his bed
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 lb boxer and I wanted him to have a comfortable bed that supports his large frame. Only one problem, his sister also wants his bed. Seriously it is a great bed for a large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to replace the cover within 3 years or so
customer_reviews.text: The pillow itself is absolutely wonderful and is great for my large dog. The only thing is the cover..it has lasted 3 years. The zipper broke on it and now I have to order a new one, at $100. They offer a 10 year guarantee on the mattress portion which is great, but replacing the cover is very expensive also and that is not covered as far as I know. 5 stars for the mattress, 3 for the cover.
customer_reviews.author: dawny224

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely a wonderful bed but unfortunately I had to return it. My dog, a 10 year old lab, refused to get on this bed. I put his blanket on it, I got on it, I moved it around and I removed his old bed. For 3 weeks he flat out refused. So...he's blissfully back to his old beat up bed. I guess we need to keep in mind that our elderly dogs, like people, sometimes do not like change even if it is better for them.
customer_reviews.author: lkg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: Our 110 lb, 7 year old Chocolate Lab loves his new Big Barker bed! It is beautifully constructed and looks good in every room...we keep it in the family room during the day and walk it to our bedroom at night. Easy to remove washable cover, and reassemble. The only concern is the zipper - there is no housing so the zipper is in direct contact with my wood floors. Disappointed that I had to modify by placing a piece of rubber tape over it, but it protects my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Teachu2

customer_reviews.title: great quality, uncomfortable dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted my dog to like this bed that's supposed to be good for his hip dysplasia, but he refuses to sleep on it. He was choosing the cheap walmart mat over Big Barker, and after I hid old mat- he's using floor instead. It's doesn't seem that the design is comfortable for him. My dog is 89 lbs, and I purchased extra large.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!  Dogs deserve the best!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both love their new beds! They are real beds! I can lay down on them & watch TV with my German Shepherds comfortably! The dogs really seem to notice the difference. The Barker beds are worth every penny! My dogs like to go outside and play. I would suggest a lighter color like the buckskin choice if you have extremely active dogs who get their paws dirty. I chose “chocolate” color, so it shows dried dirt a bit, but it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lady

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!! Waste of money!! A Joke for customer service too.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless waste of a lot of money on a dog bed. After an extended trail for my dog to even use the bed, he won't go near it. When given the option, he prefers the cheap PetSmart bed I got him. If you don't use their website to purchase, they wipe their hands clean of you. DON'T BUY A BIG BARKER DOG BED!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky the Voice

customer_reviews.title: Superb Bed, Especially for Giant Breeds!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is fantastic! We got it for our Great Dane Linus and he loves it. In the past, he’s ruined several cheaper beds by dragging them around the house and shaking them like a fresh kill, so the beds would tear easily, lose stuffing, etc., but the Big Barker bed is so heavy and sturdy that he’s not tempted. It’s also very soft and supportive and it’s big enough that Linus can stretch out comfortably (I tried it out myself). It’s somewhat more expensive than previous beds, but definitely worth the cost because of high quality. We also love the modern look. It's not an unsightly heap of fluff like some of his previous beds! Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Heim

customer_reviews.title: My Dobermans and I Love This Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best quality orthopedic dog bed I've come across and pays for itself. I echo the top reviews for this product and highly recommend to everyone. One hint I have for casual everyday life is that a waterproof single bed mattress cover fits this bed rather well and is super easy to put on and take off to wash in seconds while keeping the beautiful bed's upholstery in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Simon

customer_reviews.title: As a hospice veterinarian I highly recommend this bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a hospice veterinarian and making sure my patients get a restful sleep is very important. Whether my patients have been diagnosed with cancer or they have mobility concerns, a restful sleep promotes healing and recovery. This bed is phenomenal quality. I would recommend this bed for pets of any age, but especially our senior babies. My English Bulldog Rambo LOVES his Big Barker Bed. I included a few pictures of when he opened his bed on Christmas and also how we incorporated his bed in our post op recovery suite following a recent surgery (aka our living room!). Thank you Eric Shannon for making a bed that can help make our pets golden years as comfortable as possible!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette T Schacher

customer_reviews.title: Great size for Bernese Mountain Dog
customer_reviews.text: This bed is certainly big enough. My 11 year old arthritic Bernese Mountain Dog has taken to it, albeit slowly. He's restless at night but does flop down on this for a few hours at a time. Our younger Berner takes his turn on it now and again, too. It is hard to find a bed big enough for our dogs and this thankfully is. I ordered it with the headrest but in hindsight would have gone with the flat one as neither dog is using the headrest. Still plenty of room for them to stretch out. Good quality and the fact that the cover zips off is quite the bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but will last for several years.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the big barker beds. I bought one a few years ago and to this day, it had held it's shape nicely. I bought two more to keep in my bedroom so they had quality comfort during the night. The only reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because as expensive as they are, they should give you a waterproof liner for free instead of charging extra for it. My older dog has bladder issues so I just made my own liner with a large contractor bag and then put the cover back on. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stephanos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog bed- will last
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. I wish I had one as nice! It is very thick and although the foam makes it comfy, it is still supportive and doesn't just squish under her. She is 52 pounds and a heeler and this bed, although some may think it's a bit large, seems to be the perfect size so she can really stretch out on it. The quality is such that I can tell it should last. I did purchase the waterproof liner and am glad I did that to protect the bed. The outer shell unzips and is easily removed for cleaning when it needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeamic

customer_reviews.title: Fanstastic!
customer_reviews.text: Recently got these beds, and my four German Shepherds wasted no time checking them out. I have spent a fortune on dog beds in the past, and ALL of them have disappointed me in one way or another.. However, these beds look and feel like they will be around awhile. They are quality made, large enough for my 100 lbs+ dogs, and they are very comfortable (I tried them out first.) Yes, they are expensive compared to most of the other ones out there, but in this case, you get what you paid for!!
customer_reviews.author: Astara

customer_reviews.title: Our 12 year old german shepherd loves this bed.
customer_reviews.text: Our old guy is getting some arthritis and this bed seems to help. I believe this bed would have been plenty big for him at his largest(120 lbs) he is now 101 and it's more than sufficient. He's a tall long German that's slim and he loves the pillow function at the end of the bed. This bed is the chase bed not the "L" shaped sofa version. We have washed the cover twice already and it still looks brand new. Low heat dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sed8u

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for my 80 pound GSD
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked and looked for a new bed for my 80 pound GSD. While there are certainly a lot of cheaper options out there, I ultimately settled on the Big Barker based on the excellent feedback on Amazon. I am very happy with what I received, and my dog immediately took to the bed. I appreciate that the cover is washable and the foam core provides tons of support. My dog completely flattened her last bed from a big box store. Now it's even harder to get her up in the morning. Note that size Large is a perfect fit for my dog (initially I thought I would need the XL).
customer_reviews.author: Nick T

customer_reviews.title: 185lb English Mastiff-Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We tried several “large” pet beds purchased from a variety of places, and ultimately they’d end up flattened from the weight of our dog. But we’ve had the BigBarker for many months now, and I swear there is no happier dog out there than ours when he’s taking a nap on this bed. I’m pretty jealous of it, tbh. He has plenty of room on all sides. My 7 y/o sometimes lays on it with him to play his tablet. Overall, we are very happy with this! Best bed we’ve owned thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best investment. Yes
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment. Yes. It is Expensive, BUT completely worth the money. our two huskies took to the extra large bed immediately and have been fighting over it ever sense. Our older husky who has severe hip problems has gotten noticeably less stiff..we have tried everything and nothing has helped. but this bed did it. We can't wait to get our second one! which should be a recommendation in itself!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Dog won’t leave the bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my canine nephew who has tendonitis in his shoulder. The bed must be awesome because he refuses to leave it! He seems to love it and that makes me happy. He is a German Shepherd and he lounges on it comfortably. Worth the money. Made in the USA and as far as I know, no strange chemical smells reported like the other models sold.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: My GSP loved it out of the box!  Quality. Quality. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened the box I knew I had a quality product. My German Shorthaired Pointer couldn’t agree more. I bought two: one for the living room and one for the bedroom. No doubt he’ll be sleeping soundly for years to come. I had company the first weekend. She’s a vet tech, and even she commented on what nice beds they are. She’s going to order one for her pup when she gets home.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: 6 years later, it still looks like new
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my dog almost 6 years ago. As I was putting the cover back on it after washing it this weekend, I decided I really needed to write a review. The bed has maintained its shape after 6 years of my 80# lab sleeping on it, and the cover washes up and looks like new. I wash the cover once a month or more, and it has no tears anywhere and the zipper still works perfectly. This bed was definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Dog has taken right to it
customer_reviews.text: We've only had it a few days. Bought the mid-size for our 70lb dog who has bad knees. She much prefers that to the floor or the other softer bed we have.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Anna

customer_reviews.title: Big naps for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Both of our dogs love this bed. We got the one with the roll at the head of it and they love resting their head up on it. It’s soft, but firm and supportive. No doubt you can find a softer bed, but the stuffing in those gets all out of whack within a few months. We also accidentally left this out on the balcony overnight one time and it rained pretty good...we washed the cover, squeezed it out, let it dry for a day and it was good as new. I highly recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a bed they won’t have to replace in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schwichtenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my cattle dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog gracie loves this bed! I ordered the extra large since she is a large cattle dog. Actually it could fit two of her! She sleeps on it every day. The best part is that you can unzip the cover and throw it in the washer! I knew from all of the 5 star reviews that this would be a keeper for years and i was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: My Lab Loved It From Day One!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 year old Lab LOVED this bed from the first night! We were pleased it did not have any off-gassing which makes new foam products smell awful for a few days. We were also impressed how quickly it got here. I especially like the size and thickness of the mattress. Beds I could have purchased at local stores were wimpy but this is a nice firmness but not rock hard mattress. I hope my dog will live for many more years and hopefully this bed will ease his future hip issues that are typical of Labs. I would MOST definitely buy this dog bed again!
customer_reviews.author: David M. Holt

customer_reviews.title: winner winner
customer_reviews.text: got this for my senior dog who has bad hips. she seems to be comfortable while on this bed, no panting, stays in one spot for awhile. which makes me happy. the price is high, but i feel like the bed is good quality and for me worth it if i don't have to worry about my dog being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our 84 lb mastiff puppy. Our puppy will not sleep on this bed which I assume due to the strong chemical odor. We have aired out the bed now for 3 1/2 weeks and my puppy sleeps on the floor next to the bed. The bed is thick and comfortable but the cover looks very flimsy and cheap. I would love to return this bed but I have no idea on how to get it back as it was wrapped and condensed in plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for our 2 year old Great Dane. He's about 160lbs and needs substantial support for his joints. He's eaten many beds but this one he hasn't touched. We can't get him off it. I ordered the XL as he likes to sleep curled up. When I took it out of the pack I thought I made a mistake by not getting the XXL but this one fits him perfect and takes up less room in my house. The head pillow is a must. I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: pound555

customer_reviews.title: Almost as comfortable as my temperpedic
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our four month old English Mastiff and she absolutely loves it especially the built-in pillow she recently had a urinary tract infection and had to either be outside or in her kennel so I ended up sleeping on her bed with her and aside from the fact that my feet were hanging off the end it was almost as comfortable as my bed I also really like the fact that it has a 10 year warranty on the mattress
customer_reviews.author: bufu

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 117-pound lab has arthritis in both her back and front legs. Prior to getting the Big Barker 7-inch Pillow Top Orthopedic Extra Large Bed, she had a 3-inch orthopedic foam bed purchased from another online pet supply company, but she could not get comfortable on it to sleep. Now she is in 7th heaven sleeping soundly in her new Big Barker Orthopedic bed and she has had improved mobility with her front and back legs when she wakes up. She also loves the headrest. The delivery was super quick and the product packaging was excellent. Two-paws-up from my dog and 5-stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Mida M.

customer_reviews.title: I read really really good reviews on this bed and its a decent bed
customer_reviews.text: I read really really good reviews on this bed and its a decent bed. However both my dogs want nothing to do with it. They slept on it the first night and now they sleep next to it and when I encourage either of them to lie on it you would think I was asking them to take a bath along with the vacuum cleaner going!!! They hate it! So, now Im stuck with a really expensive dog bed that they lay next too.
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Cricket

customer_reviews.title: The best dog bed on Earth!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best bed I have ever owned (or have seen on Earth). I haven't been to any other planets yet, but on earth this is simply the best bed you can buy for your furry friend. My 90 lb German Shepherd absolutely loves it. Best of all, the MFG is in the USA and offers an unparalleled 10 year warranty! There was a minor issue in my order and the company immediately fixed it. Beautiful product, even more beautiful company. The best dog bed on Earth!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

product_meta.title: Big Barker 7" Pillow Top Orthopedic Dog Bed for Large and Extra Large Breed Dogs (Headrest Edition)
feature_bullets: CALIBRATED FOR BIG DOGS: Available in Large, XL, Giant XXL dog bed sizes. Too powerful for small dogs.
CLINICALLY PROVEN: University of Pennsylvania study data showed less pain, more mobility after using a Big Barker for just 28 days.
10 YEAR WARRANTY: American made therapeutic foam is the best quality you'll find in orthopedic dog beds. Won't flatten or pancake over time.
MADE IN THE USA: Handmade by experienced craftsmen and craftswomen in our small Pennsylvania workshop.
EASY TO CLEAN: machine washable. 100% Micro-suede cover. Soft to the touch, looks great in your home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
